Text: As a business partner, Marcio is a very serious and commited professional.   Very focused to deliver best solutions to his company, always keeping organization and realm of all shipments.     Deep knowledge regaring all logistic needs for each producer, route and goods.   Besided that, Marcio is a proactive and tireless contributor who would make a great addition to any team. He was a fantastic person to work with. Broad-minded and result driven professional. Strong, careful and always punctual.
